# `NAMESPACE` MAWS.Data
Data stuff

## `CLASS` Validate.cs
Validate data.

### `METHOD` AvatarUserName()
Validate the myAvatar username.

#### Details
None.

#### Notes
If the value in sentOptObj.OptionUserId is null/whitespace/empty, return the fallback username from the settings file.
